name: Datatabletoolsplugin
tagline: Table Tool Plugin implementation  in PHP
body:
### Welcome to Data tools plugin page
This example shows how to add the popular table tools plugin with Bootstrap style in PHP.

### Designer Templates
The example have been design based on MVC but used just the view to populate the view

### Authors and Contributors
Code written by @Riddhika. The is example of integration of original TableTools plug-in for DataTables, providing export (XLS, CSV), print view and copy to clipboard http://datatables.net/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
